meanings.definition: The greater number or part; more than half.
meanings.sent1: In the vote, the majority chose pizza over burgers.
meanings.sent2: The majority of the students preferred playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The majority of the cookies disappeared mysteriously overnight.
meanings.sent4: The colorful balloons filled the room, a majority in shades of blue.
meanings.sent5: The majority of the puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.

meanings.definition: The amount by which a number exceeds half of the total.
meanings.sent1: She won the game by a majority of ten points.
meanings.sent2: The majority of the cake was eaten by the time I arrived.
meanings.sent3: The majority of the books on the shelf were upside down.
meanings.sent4: His laughter echoed through the room, a majority of joy in the air.
meanings.sent5: The majority of the paint had dried by the time she finished painting.
